container_group_name.title: Container Group Name
container_group_name.description: Required* Must be 2-63 lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Cannot start with a number or start/end with a hyphen.

networking_auth.title: Require Container Gateway Authentication
networking_auth.description: When enabled, requests must include a SaladCloud API Key. Disable for public access.

compute_dtype.title: Compute Precision
compute_dtype.description: Torch dtype used during generation. float16 works well on modern NVIDIA GPUs.

max_new_tokens.title: Max New Tokens
max_new_tokens.description: Maximum number of audio tokens per request. Larger values increase latency and memory usage.

cfg_scale.title: CFG Scale
cfg_scale.description: Higher values adhere more strongly to the prompt but may reduce diversity.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Sampling temperature. Higher values increase randomness.

cfg_filter_top_k.title: CFG Filter Top-k
cfg_filter_top_k.description: Number of logits to consider in classifier-free guidance filtering.

speed_factor.title: Speed Factor
speed_factor.description: Playback speed adjustment applied after generation. 1.0 keeps the original speed.
